Collins and Y. Singer. 1999. Unsupervised models for named entity classification. In Proc. of the 1999 Joint SIGDAT Conference, College Park, MD, pages 100--110. 4 Ann Copestake and Ted Briscoe. 1995. Semi-productive polysemy and sense extension. Journal of Semantics, 12:15--67.

5 Steffan Corley, Martin Corley, Frank Keller, Matthew Crocker, and Shari Trewin. 2001. Finding syntactic structure in unparsed corpora: The Gsearch corpus query system. 8 Christiane Fellbaum, editor. 1998. WordNet: An Electronic Lexical Database. MIT Press, Cambridge, Mass.

9 William Gale, Kenneth Church, and David Yarowsky. 1993. A method for disambiguating word senses in a large corpus. Computers and the Humanities, 26:415--439. 10 Sanda Harabagiu. 1998. 14 George Lakoff and Mark Johnson. 1980. Metaphors We Live By. Chicago University Press, Chicago, Ill.
